keyword: how many calories in a drumstick
title: How Many Calories in a Drumstick?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a drumstick, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, and tips for variations like skinless or fried.
h1: How Many Calories in a Drumstick?
assumptions: Chicken drumstick with skin, roasted, medium size (~100 g), no added sauces or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by chicken size, skin inclusion, cooking method, and brand; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One medium roasted chicken drumstick with skin has ~215 kcal and ~24 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a chicken drumstick with skin?
faqs.a: About 215 kcal for one medium roasted drumstick with skin.

faqs.q: What if the drumstick is skinless?
faqs.a: Skinless reduces it to ~135 kcal, with less fat (~4 g).

faqs.q: How much protein in a drumstick?
faqs.a: Roughly 24 g protein per medium roasted drumstick.

faqs.q: Does frying a drumstick add calories?
faqs.a: Yes, frying adds ~100 kcal due to absorbed oil, totaling ~315 kcal.
One has ~93 mg cholesterol, mostly from the skin and meat.
